title: Sky of Calvaria - Bestiarium (2015) ak
description:
Sky Of Calvary come from Lebach in SaarbrÃƒÂ¼cken and throw many ingredients in the metal pot. 
Some riffs could smoothly come from the mid-eighties, swiped from the big names of Thrash (Canis Majoris 666, Demon Hunt), others sound very contemporary and transition the bridge from very old Metallica to bands like Misery Index to the current Death, tech and whatever is just modern metal .

Technically everything first rate. Also the songs are neither too long nor too brief. 
 The production is enormous, transparent and polished, as is required on such an album.  
Sky of Calvary are coming at ya
